explains: vt. 洗涤；清洗；洗黑钱（把来路可疑的钱弄得貌似合法）

sentences.en: The House voted today to crack down on banks that launder drug money.
sentences.cn: 下议院今天投票打击为贩毒洗钱的银行。

sentences.en: How many guests who expect clean towels every day in an hotel launder their own every day at home?
sentences.cn: 旅店里希望每天有干净毛巾的客人中，有多少人每天在家洗自己的毛巾呢？

sentences.en: Nine are also charged with conspiracy to launder money.
sentences.cn: 其中九人还被指控以共谋洗钱罪。
